channel.title: [TuT] Fixing NRS3Scape's Mage
channel.description:
Okay this is more of a snippet and its still not 100% Magic completed, but if you toy around with it, I'm sure you'll get it working 100%.
Here is my [font=arial black]PlayerCombat.java[/font] [url=http://uppit.com/ykryhm0s203h/PlayerCombat.java] http://uppit.com/ykryhm0s203h/PlayerCombat.java [/url]
Paste it in [code] src\com\rs\game\player\actions\combat [/code]
Look for: [code] player.getSkills().addXp(6, 5); [/code]
Change it to the amount of Exp that YOU want.
*This is where i said why its NOT 100%*
Every time you cast you will get THAT amount of exp. The exp gained will NOT go any higher when you hit harder, you will just constantly gain that amount.
Have fun!
Credits to The Soul Also TimeRS3 for making the source

item.title: [TuT] Fixing NRS3Scape's Mage
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

maccrash5:

what would a good number be to change it to?

Something high,

I went like this

1,500 for air strike
2,000 for water strike
2,500 for earth
3,000 for fire
4,000 for air
4,500 for water
5,000 for earth
5,500 for fire
6.000 for air
7,000 for water
8,000 for earth
9,000 for fire
10,000 for air
11,500 for water
13,000 for earth
14,500 for Fire

keeps going

and for ancients i started off at 10k and went up by 1k for each spell till it got to Barrage then it ended up around like 40k+

Read full topic

item.title: [TuT] Fixing NRS3Scape's Mage
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Okay this is more of a snippet and its still not 100% Magic completed, but if you toy around with it, I’m sure you’ll get it working 100%.

Here is my [font=arial black]PlayerCombat.java[/font]

http://uppit.com/ykryhm0s203h/PlayerCombat.java

Paste it in

src\com\rs\game\player\actions\combat

Look for:

                    player.getSkills().addXp(6, 5);

Change it to the amount of Exp that YOU want.

This is where i said why its NOT 100%

Every time you cast you will get THAT amount of exp. The exp gained will NOT go any higher when you hit harder, you will just constantly gain that amount.

Have fun!

Credits to The Soul
Also TimeRS3 for making the source
